expert_narrative: The radiograph shows a porcelain-fused-to-metal (PFM) crown on the maxillary right central incisor (#8) and a distinct periapical radiolucency at the apex of the maxillary right lateral incisor (#7), consistent with a periapical lesion. Other anterior teeth appear to be within normal limits.
analysis_focus: Hypothesis test: How does the model react to unseen features (pathology/restoration)? Check for Omission, Mischaracterization, or successful Generalization.
